attributes.action: Seize boats used to transport illegal immigrants
attributes.additional_details: Government wants to stop the boats. Here is a straight forward strategy to do exactly that. Especially as the boats are usually overloaded with too many people on board which is very unsafe.
attributes.background: It is possible that the same boats are being used over and over again. Seizing the boats prevents transporting more illegal immigrants.

rejection.details:
The Nationality and Borders Act 2022 grants powers to Border Force to seize and dispose of vessels used to facilitate irregular entry by sea to the UK:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/nationality-and-borders-bill-border-force-powers-to-stop-and-seize-small-boats-factsheet/nationality-and-borders-bill-border-force-powers-to-stop-and-seize-small-boats-factsheet
